item.title: Day 0 - The Turning Point
item.description: This is the first post on my journey to financial freedom. I want to provide some context around why I’ve decided that I need something more. The origins of this story reach way back to when I was younger I want to begin at the true turning point. One day I was sitting looking at my bank account like many people do. I keep good track of my bills, I rarely ever subscribe to services, and I make good money working my day job.
